Package com.gsm.service

Class BOMTemplateServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.service.BOMTemplateServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BOMTemplateService
    @Service
public class BOMTemplateServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BOMTemplateService
    The concrete implementation of the BOMTemplateService interface. Contains all business logic for managing BOM Templates.

      • save

        @Transactional
public BOMTemplateDto save​(BOMTemplateDto dto)
        Saves a BOM Template, including its detail lines. This involves checking for duplicates, mapping DTOs to entities, and synchronizing the child collection of details.
        Specified by:
